attributes.action: Change the current legislation in terms of soundproofing flats prior to 2003
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NOISE REGULATIONS ON OLD BUILDS As a UK tax payer and home owner, I believe it is my basic human right to live in peace in my own residence.  The petition is to get the law changed so that all properties should by law be soundproofed where more than one occupier lives in either a converted house into flats, blocks of flats, new but more specifically old buildings prior to 2003.
